text.listBibl:
References
[Ahl78]
Lars V. Ahlfors, Complex analysis, third ed., McGraw-Hill Book Co., New York, 1978, An
introduction to the theory of analytic functions of one complex variable, International Series
in Pure and Applied Mathematics.
[AKa]
Jørgen E. Andersen and Rinat M. Kashaev, Complex Quantum Chern-Simons, arXiv:1409.1208,
Preprint 2014.
[AKb]
, A new formulation of the Teichmüller TQFT, arXiv:1305.4291, Preprint 2013.
[AK14]
Jørgen Ellegaard Andersen and Rinat Kashaev, A TQFT from Quantum Teichmüller theory,
Comm. Math. Phys. 330 (2014), no. 3, 887-934.
[Bur]
Benjamin Burton, Regina, software for 3-manifold topology and normal surface theory,
http://regina.sourceforge.net (30/01/2015).
[CDW]
Marc Culler, Nathan M. Dunfield, and Jeffrey R. Weeks, SnapPy, a computer program for study-
ing the topology of 3-manifolds, Available at http://snappy.computop.org (30/01/2015).
[DG13]
Tudor Dimofte and Stavros Garoufalidis, The quantum content of the gluing equations, Geom.
Topol. 17 (2013), no. 3, 1253-1315.
[DGG13a] Tudor Dimofte, Davide Gaiotto, and Sergei Gukov, 3-manifolds and 3d indices, Adv. Theor.
Math. Phys. 17 (2013), no. 5, 975-1076.
[DGG13b]
, 3-manifolds and 3d indices, Adv. Theor. Math. Phys. 17 (2013), no. 5, 975-1076.
[Gar16]
Stavros Garoufalidis, The 3D index of an ideal triangulation and angle structures, Ramanujan J.
40 (2016), no. 3, 573-604.
[GHHR17] Stavros Garoufalidis, Craig D. Hodgson, Neil R. Hoffman, and J. Hyam Rubinstein, The 3D-index
and normal surfaces, Illinois J. Math. (2017).
[GHRS15] Stavros Garoufalidis, Craig D. Hodgson, J. Hyam Rubinstein, and Henry Segerman, 1-efficient
triangulations and the index of a cusped hyperbolic 3-manifold, Geom. Topol. 19 (2015), no. 5,
2619-2689.
[GK17]
Stavros Garoufalidis and Rinat Kashaev, From state integrals to q-series, Math. Res. Lett. (2017).
[Kasa]
Rinat Kashaev, The q-binomial formula and the Rogers dilogarithm identity, arXiv:math/
0407078, Preprint 2004.
[Kasb]
Rinat M. Kashaev, The Yang-Baxter relation and gauge invariance, arXiv:1510.03043, Preprint
2015.
[Kas14]
R. M. Kashaev, Beta pentagon relations, Theoret. and Math. Phys. 181 (2014), no. 1, 1194-1205,
Russian version appears in Teoret. Mat. Fiz. 181, (2014), no. 1, 73-85.
[KLV16] Rinat Kashaev, Feng Luo, and Grigory Vartanov, A TQFT of Turaev-Viro type on shaped tri-
angulations, Ann. Henri Poincaré 17 (2016), no. 5, 1109-1143.
[LT08]
Feng Luo and Stephan Tillmann, Angle structures and normal surfaces, Trans. Amer. Math. Soc.
360 (2008), no. 6, 2849-2866.
[NZ85]
Walter D. Neumann and Don Zagier, Volumes of hyperbolic three-manifolds, Topology 24 (1985),
no. 3, 307-332.
[Thu77]
William Thurston, The geometry and topology of 3-manifolds, Universitext, Springer-Verlag,
Berlin, 1977, http://msri.org/publications/books/gt3m.
[Wor92]
S. L. Woronowicz, Operator equalities related to the quantum E(2) group, Comm. Math. Phys.
144 (1992), no. 2, 417-428.
[Zag07]
Don Zagier, The dilogarithm function, Frontiers in number theory, physics, and geometry. II,
Springer, Berlin, 2007, pp. 3-65.
